headline.main: RED ARMY DEEPENS WEDGE IN CAUCASUS; Nazi Road to Crimea in Peril -- Germans Fail in Assaults on Donets River Loops RED ARMY INTRODUCES NEW MODE OF TRANSPORTATION RED ARMY DEEPENS WEDGE IN CAUCASUS

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, April 1 -- While the battle for the Donets River loops continued today, with all German attacks stonewalled by a resolute defense, the Russians' revived offensive on their southern wing in the Caucasus intensified its threat to the remaining German positions north of the swollen Kuban River.
abstract: Red Star article on Ger air tactics
